title: BTS album total sales in South Korea 2013 to 2017
yAxis: Number of sold albums in thousand copies
summary: Overall Number of sold albums in thousand copies has increased over the Year.
Number of sold albums in thousand copies is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2015.
The line drastically increased by 3.8 times from Year 2013 to 2014, and lastly, increased by 2.6 times from Year 2014 to 2015.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Number of sold albums in thousand copies, about 563.0 was reported at Year 2015
The lowest Number of sold albums in thousand copies, of value 58.0 was reported at Year 2013
min_summary: In general Number of sold albums in thousand copies has rose over the Year.
Number of sold albums in thousand copies is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2015.
